revised_title: Exploring the Phenomenon of Camphor Motions on Water
tldr: This paper investigates the complex motions of camphor on the surface of water, exploring the factors that influence these phenomena, such as the adhesion of water, the dimensions of the camphor fragment, and the presence of volatile substances. The author presents a series of experiments and observations to explain the real nature of this phenomenon and establish several propositions related to the behavior of camphor on water.
